title: Recipes For Revenge, A Four-Course Novel
description: Four women, four short stories, four recipes for revenge. Each story revolves around a woman with a specific goal â€“ a sense of affirmation, long-coming retribution, finding a good man, and a living peaceful life. Each woman has a man standing in her way of getting what she wants. A man behaving badly. A man who needs to be taught a lesson. When conscience is deafened by a screaming mind filled with revenge, there's only one thing left to do. Cook up something to die for. These spicy tales comes with a warning; if you cant take the heat, stay the hell out of the kitchen.
author: Gina Marie Barlean
